messages.title: THE PAST / THE FUTURE
messages.content: Both Tories and Labour have failed the country. Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.

mentions.candidate: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.

endorsements.endorsement: Both Tories and Labour have failed the country
British politics is falling apart - the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles
The Lib Dem fightback is real and it's changing everything.
Lib Dems winning and up after by-election victory.

quotes.text: Lib Dems winning and up after by-election victory.
The Lib Dem fightback is real and it's changing everything.

images.caption: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.
